column1: * By this time, thanks to Sauron's absense from [[Middle-earth]], [[Gil-galad]]'s power extends to [[Rhovanion]].<ref name=rings>{{S
* [[Changing of the World]] and [[Downfall of Númenor]]; the [[Undying Lands]] are removed from [[Arda]] which becomes round.<ref name=akal>{{S
*[[Elendil]], his sons and other [[Faithful]] escape on seven ships.<ref name=akal/><ref name="SA"/> Sauron's spirit also escapes to Middle-earth.<ref name=rings/>
